m_szDocTitle: Audi h-tron concept debuts in Detroit
m_szDocSumamry: You are here: Home > Audi h-tron concept debuts in Detroit Audi h-tron concept debuts in Detroit January 17, 2016 in Science However, it is also betting just as big on plug-in electric cars, with its first plug-in SUV scheduled for a 2017 production launch. Audi can always be counted on to bring a strong concept to an global automotive event and the h-tron Quattro, unveiled in Detroit on Monday continues the company tradition as well as its recent focus on greener forms of propulsion.
